net.kuujo.vertigo.data

Interface AsyncLock


  • public interface AsyncLock
    Asynchronous lock.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • name

        String name()
        Returns the lock name.
        Returns:
        The lock name.

      • lock

        void lock(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Acquires the lock.
        Parameters:
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once the lock has been acquired.

      • tryLock

        void tryLock(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Boolean>> doneHandler)
        Acquires the lock only if its available at the time of invocation.
        Parameters:
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called indicating whether the lock has been acquired.

      • tryLock

        void tryLock(long timeout,
           org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Boolean>> doneHandler)
        Acquires the lock only if its available at the time of invocation.
        Parameters:
        timeout - A timeout in milliseconds after which the lock acquisition will expire.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once the lock has been acquired.

      • unlock

        void unlock()
        Releases the lock.

      • unlock

        void unlock(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Releases the lock.
        Parameters:
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once the lock has been released.
